Room.Name: Appleton Road/Nagaritha Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Nagaritha Drive and Appleton Road.
Room.LongDescription: This is a rather minor intersection between the farming estates on the south and the cattle ranch on the north. Appleton Road runs diagonally through the city to the northwest and southeast. On the southeastern corner of the intersection, there is a small pub between Appleton Road and Overland Drive. The main entrance to the pub is on Nagaritha Drive.
